data.title: off EMEA 'Exchange' Event Series
data.text:
LONDON and ATLANTA, Oct. 4, 2010 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Manhattan Associates (Nasdaq:MANH) kicks-off its annual series of customer conferences in the Europe, Middle East and Africa (EMEA) region with its first 'Exchange' customer conference taking place tomorrow at Le Pavillon de l'Eau in Paris. The conference in France will be followed by events in the UK, taking place on October 7th at Chesford Grange, Kenilworth, Warwickshire, and in Central Europe on October 12th, where the venue will be the Woudschoten Conferentie Centrum in Zeist, the Netherlands. Following a strong year for Manhattan in EMEA, the conferences are expected to attract a record number of delegates from across the region and will include representation from countries including Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Russia and the UK.

The Manhattan Exchange events offer delegates a comprehensive and authoritative overview of trends and developments influencing today's and tomorrow's supply chain industry. A mixture of case study presentations and thought leadership perspectives will enable delegates to learn first-hand from other organizations about their experiences implementing industry-specific solutions and the ROI they have achieved, as well as offer a glimpse of the challenges that supply chain executives will face in the years ahead.

The Manhattan team will be running a combination of solution presentation sessions, workshops and speed clinics at each of the events so delegates can learn about the various components of Manhattan's supply chain optimisation solutions portfolio and how these technologies can support their organisations and drive value for them. A range of complementary technologies and services from Manhattan Associates' alliance partners including ATG, Cybersource, IBM, KSA, KSD Software, LXE, Motorola, Psion, Scott-Grant Productivity Services, Sopra Group, Vocollect, Voiteq, Voxware and Zetes, and from Manhattan GeoPartners including Nobex, MG Supply Chain and Supply Nexus, will also feature at the events.

For further information about Manhattan Exchange, please visit http://www.manh.com/events/manhattan-exchange.

To read the entire release, please visit http://www.manh.com/news/manhattan-associates-kick-off-emea-exchange-event-series

Receive up-to-date product, customer and partner news directly from Manhattan Associates on Twitter and Facebook. Just visit www.twitter.com/ManhAssocNews to follow our latest news and join the Manhattan Associates Facebook group at //www.facebook.com/ManhattanAssociates.

About Manhattan Associates, Inc.

Manhattan Associates continues to deliver on its 20-year heritage of providing global supply chain excellence to more than 1,200 customers worldwide that consider supply chain optimization core to their strategic market leadership. The company's supply chain innovations include: Manhattan SCOPE® a portfolio of software solutions and technology that leverages a Supply Chain Process Platform to help organizations optimise their supply chains from planning through execution; Manhattan SCALE™, a portfolio of distribution management and transportation management solutions built on Microsoft .NET technology; and Manhattan Carrier™, a suite of supply chain solutions specifically addressing the needs of the motor carrier industry. For more information, please visit www.manh.com.

CONTACT: Manhattan Associates, Inc. John Bird, Director, International Communications Strategy +44 (0) 1344 318071 jbird@manh.com LEWIS Public Relations Julie Walsh juliew@lewispr.com Anna Fazakerley annaf@lewispr.com +44 (0) 207 802 2626
